One of our favorite places on Trans Central Highway. Good food, great service and cool place to enjoy. And affordable. Open now from Wednesday thru Sunday.

Good food, brewed coffee and efficient service combined with cool temperatures, fresh air and grand vista's.
Now open wednesday thru sunday. Same great staff and good food.
Best time is breakfast time and must try the suman with mango and tabliya

Accommodating staff. They are only open from thursdays to sundays. Luckily, we set our tour on a thursday, so we were able to go to the cafe. We brought our own lunch from the hotel, to which they charged us a minimal corkage fee of P30 per ‚Ä¶
A nice place to drop by and enjoy the view.
A nice place to stop by and have breakfast or lunch!
2 hour drive from negative.  The facility was closed when the website center was open. Cost me a whole bunch of money very disappointed

Safe and enjoyable.. great comfort food too!

This place is nice and is very relaxing. This is one of the many coffee shops you‚Äôll find if you‚Äôre traversing the very long Transcentral Highway. They serve good coffee. I had native hot chocolate or sikwate as most bisayas call it and my ‚Ä¶
Always nice to stop for coffee and some picapica.
Affordable lomi ...right match for the cool weather in balamban.
Relaxing atmosphere away from the crowded places within the area...Friendly staff

The place feels really cozy to me due to the weather when I got there and with the food they are serving made me feel warm because of their yummy lomi special and they also have a zipline which allows you to see an amazing view on the surrounding areas over all it is a really good place with the best views and yummy comfort food
Stop over cafe from Cebu city going to Balamban, a nice place for adventure and dine-in the place is overlooking from Balamban shipyard.
This place is cool literally and figuratively. You can dine, have coffee, chill and zip. They also have suman and sikwate and cheesecake and ice cream.
If you come here even on  ‚Ä¶
Raw burgers cooked on the outside ,raw on the inside.
Very nice place, (although rusts are clearly showing on the ceiling). Food's good. Will definitely recommend for travellers passing the highway.
The place is so cool!!!! Stop over for traveller like me!

I was just passing by this place with a friend to sip coffee in front of a good view of the mountains. This was the perfect spot.They have a zipline to but we didn't try it. They also have a spot where you can throw plates...if you are angry, or stressed.
I love this place to meet biker friends
#AWESOME PLACE TO HAVE FUN IN ZIPLINING RIDE. AND THEIR  #CARROTCAKE ARE the #Best in the world.
If you'll surely wanted to have a road trip experience with friends .  don't miss to drop by at adventure cafe, try the zipline and the foods.
Puto't sikwate is superb! I love it so much!
Must do when in town, good food and the zip line is really fun and safe
Great place for zip lining decent cafe
Zip line a must try... Food, not so much. Enjoy the view and a good scenic drive for a short trip from the city.
Nice place for a quick meal and coffee.

If you are up to a venture kind of experience and it's your first time to step out from your comfort zone, then try out at Adventure Cafe. Be thrilled by their zipline and be astound by the mountain view. It is an awesome place to relax and get away from the City.
Great scenic view over looking west. Feel the breeze and the ambiance.
Menu is very affordable, great place for riders.
I like the feel and ambiance of the caf√©. The zipline is nice although short. Not very short, just short compared to others. It is a good place to hang out with friends and it can be romantic too.

Our go to destination to cool down & unwind from busy city life. Stop over area after camping too. Their chicken tinola is the perfect comfort food. Huge serving too! For snacks we always have the usual Cebuano budbod sikwate :)
Nice cold place to unwind. You should try their ripe mango and suman combo plus hot cocoa drink
Foods were fine but it's the view that makes my review 5. Zipline for only 205pesos. So cheap!

Although far from City but worth it to be here..

review_text: Our favorite go-to place for breakfast rides! Enjoy great view, with good friends, and yummy food. They serve corned beef, tapa, omelette, and many more and yes all served with brewed coffee. A great place to unwined and un-stressed! Just check it out for yourself now!
Nice place, we just did not like our food...
Food was Great! There is great dessert cakes!  Prices very reasonal kids loved zipline!
Awesome 4 stars for me. If food is serve outside as well then 5 stars.
Nice chilling place with nice view. Can have some desserts , meals and drinks. Got a zipline in 2 way direction.
Great experience, Wait was not to long and the food was not bad. I would not recommend the tuna sandwich but I still ate it. Friendly staff.
Fun zipline with a cafe. Don't wear sandals, haha, unless you want to go searching for them in the jungle.
Nice and province rest house ambiance.
Nice cool place with delicious food. Thanks for the great service
Food is good but didn't do the Zipline when we came there it was maintenance week to check cables.
Nice view of southwest side of Cebu. Lots of rain forest, although  when we were there the zip line was under maintenance.. üòû ‚Ä¶
Good stop over for road trips. Scenic place and a breath of fresh air.
Nice view. Nice place. Food was good.
Good foods and this is my first zipline experience can't forget the experience.

A fun restaurant with a zipline and dish breakers...^^

Nice place fresh good team as biker we stay every Sunday in that place..
Its ok have a small bar and a restaurant w/ some enthusiastic adventure..
waited for long with our order
Awesome place to unwind with a coffee
Been here to travel, explore, see the beauty of Balamban. Zipline was kinda excellent cause its also my first time hehe thought there are lots of fun activities.
Nice place. It's a little cold there especially on the rooftop. Not that expensive rate for the zipline only 150.
Food is great and the crew are friendly.
Nothing special about the food. Service was terrible. The only thing worth while is the ambience.

Service is a little slow but food here is great. It is a good place for snacks on your stop over for those whose who are exploring Cebu. While waiting for your food, and not scared of a little adventure can ride their zip line or wall climb. The weather up there gets really nice and cool on most days.
Though it's a bit far it was a pretty great hangout spot near the main road and you can get bit of zipline thrills in
Cool, short zipline over the valley. In restaurant u can have great pumpkin soup and a lot of deserts.

The view is just amazing. And you'll love the weather because it's often cold in here since we're on top of the mountain. You can dine and do zipline in here and I don't know what else to say. üòÇ ‚Ä¶
Amazing nature cafe witj zip line.
A great place to enjoy, good view and fresh air
Nice and cool place and their foods are delicio ‚Ä¶

Me and my friends favorite place. We always dropby Adventure Cafe when we used to go to Balamban. The foods are great and affordable.Our favorites are baby back ribs, lumpia shanghai, pancit canton and budbud with chocolate syrup. Looking forward on our next visit. üòÑ ‚Ä¶
